feed.title: RSS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.4.4
entry.content:
• Bumped up JavaScript packages.
  • Updated build system to use NodeJS 20 instead of 18.
  • Updated GitHub docker image build system to latest working actions.

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.4.5
entry.content:
• Bumped up PHP package versions.
  • Updated cron/schedule system to use same user as app, to avoid file permission issues leading to app errors. #24

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.0
entry.content:
• Updated framework from Laravel 10 to 11
  • Updated PHP version to PHP 8.3

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.2
entry.content:
• Updated PHP & JS dependencies (technically part of 1.5.1) .
  • Updated repo, workflows, and docker image to be Codeberg hosted.

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.3
entry.content:
• Updated PHP & JS dependencies
  • Fixed issue where some feeds would not be parsed due to basic content checks (#30)
